BR_text.BRsummary: wordClass3 model (CTC) in OCR Evaluator is not working.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Hi Breta, while running OCR Evaluator, all the models are working except for worldClass3 model.
 Note :
 as mentioned by you in a previous issue, I've changed the wordClass2 model to SeqRNN/Classifier.
 <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>

comments_0.comment_text: It is because of a wrong slider value, it should set as slide=(60, 60). I will fix it in next commit.
